hero.quote: "Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad."
hero.intro1: My name is Mohamed and I'm an ambitious front-end developer with experience in React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
hero.intro2: My goal is to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. I can quickly analyze problems and solve them both independently and in a team.

story.quote: "I'm writing my story so that others might see fragments of themselves."
story.title: MY STORY
paragraphs: Hi there, my name is Mohamed Helles, and I'm a passionate Front-End Developer with experience in building modern web applications.

My journey in web development began at Gaza Sky Geeks Code Academy, where I completed an immersive Career Accelerator Program that ran five days a week, 8 hours a day for 8 months. This intensive bootcamp helped me build a solid foundation in web development with React.js and Node.js.

Since then, I've worked with companies like NadSoft, Scopal, and Suhool Investment, where I've developed and maintained various web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and TypeScript.

I'm constantly learning and improving my skills. I've completed courses in React Native Development and React & TypeScript Architecture to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices.
I'm passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications that solve real-world problems.
